StoryText: %FirstNameNPC1% is taking me out to learn to ride my new bike!
Question: This is the first time I have ever tried riding without stabilizers.

OptionText.Text: Do everything you're told. You trust %FirstNameNPC1%!
Do what you're told, unless it seems too scary.

OptionResult.Result: It turns out that %FirstNameNPC1% has a lot of faith in your abilities. You fall over a few times, and graze your knee, but by the end, you can ride your bike!
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: I learned to ride my bike today! I did everything I was told, fell off a few times, but hey! Now I can do it!

OptionResult.Result: %FirstNameNPC1% did get a little frustrated with me at times when I insisted that they hold the bike steady for a little. I suppose it did take longer. But... I can now ride my new bike!
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: I learnt to ride my bike today! Sure, it took me a while, and I was nervous, but who isn't when first getting on a two wheeled deathtrap?

OptionResult.Result: %FirstNameNPC1% was way too bossy, and I would've hurt myself if I'd done what they told me. Instead, I tried teaching myself how to ride my bike. I am closer, but can't quite ride yet.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: I guess I irritated %FirstNameNPC1%... but they were making me way too nervous! Instead, I tried to learn to ride my bike by myself. I'm getting better, but I'm not quite there yet.
